chapter.title: Creating a Signed Delegation - Child Zone Activity
chapter.para: This section describes the steps required by a child for creating a signed delegation.

section.title: Securely Transfer the Keyset to the Parent
section.para: If any of the zone's KSKs have changed since the last time this file was sent to the parent, then they keyset must also be transferred to the parent. If none of the zone's KSKs have changed, this step may be skipped.
Secure communication between the parent and child zone is done out-of-band.

section.title: Wait for the Parent to Publish the DS Record
section.para: Before proceeding, wait for the parent zone the publish the DS record. This may be found by using the dig command to retrieve the zone's DS record. The aa flag in the result must be set and the ANSWER section must not be empty.
You may continue if the DS record is the same as the value in the file generated in or .
